content:
Altarum is pleased to announce an opening for a Software Engineer to join our Interoperability Team. Software Engineers are responsible for supporting the design, development and implementation of FHIR-based health information technology solutions within the Division of Connected Health. Connected Health is committed to modernizing the Public Health IT Infrastructure and is looking for a full-stack developer to help pave the way. This person will work collaboratively with a multi-disciplinary team of developers, analysts and public health interoperability SMEs.

The company is based in Ann Arbor Michigan but the position can be remote anywhere in the US
